title: Halifax Transit reducing weekly service by 30% effective Monday
description: Halifax Transit will be reducing its weekly service by 30 per cent on Monday to protect transit workers and reduce the spread of COVID-19. Ridership on all city transit is down 62 per cent.
content: Halifax Transit will be reducing its weekly service by per cent on Monday to protect transit workers and reduce the spread of COVID Dave Reage the director of Halifax Transit told reporters on Friday that ridership on all city transit is down per chars
